sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali organizacije
compete with each other
, se trudijo, da bi dobile nekaj zase.

seg.quote: This would enable British shipbuilders to compete with foreign yards.
Senior members of staff competed eagerly for the honour of representing the company.

sense.def:
To compete in a contest or a game
pomeni sodelovati na natečaju ali tekmi.

seg.quote: Dave Moorcroft has now competed in two Olympics.

sense.def:
Kadar dve izjavi ali zamisli
compete
, ne moreta biti obe pravilni ali sprejemljivi.

seg.quote: Various competing theories are compared and discussed.
